  • Unit 9 ePortfolio Activity - Improving Code Quality

In this unit, we were to do an eportfolio activity that had us improve the code quality of any previous Python code that we had written. It had to adhere to the strategies in the 2019 seminar from James Mertz, ‚ÄúWriting Clean and Pythonic Code‚Äù (Mertz, 2019).

  • Mertz, J. (2019). Writing Clean and Pythonic Code. Available at: https://dataverse.jpl.nasa.gov/file.xhtml?fileId=63890&version=1.0 [Accessed 27 November, 2023]
